9.7.22  1:04 am   what is the best way to ride an octupus

      if you can get one of the self-riding ones

9.7.22  12:19 am   worst part of the music indsutry?

     that point where you're collapsing in insecurity because you realize there is actually no right answer for what makes music good

     best part of music idnustry?

     rejoicing in the feeling that there is infinite music to be infinitely rewarding to both creator and listener

      most "nguieh" part in music industry?

     scheduling?

9.6.22  11:28 pm   What makes a song so musical 

      you may have to do it

9.6.22  11:11 pm   are you agnostic

      i don't know

9.6.22  10:17 pm   Why am I me and not someone else?

      why would you be someone else and not you

9.6.22  10:11 pm   in hotewig, what was the significance (in the most literal sense) of the frame during the big bang where the words "i have nightmares" can be seen?

      any developing universe will reach that point as soon as it's complex enough for stories to occur

9.6.22  10:08 pm   are you gonna make another song after this one?

      yes

9.6.22  9:28 pm   If we had 3 legs, would marches be in 3/4?

      probably 6/8

9.6.22  9:04 pm   can you literally think laterally

      actually no

9.6.22  8:04 pm   On a scale of 1 to 10, how would you rate the numbers 1 through 10?

      5.5

9.6.22  6:28 pm   when did you first get the idea for your next song?

      the idea for the chords and melody for the first 4 bars is from april 11, 2019. The first 8 bars of lyrics were written for it on april 20, 2021

9.6.22  4:26 pm   i think i'd like to get an education and go into the high life and then climb back down. but i'm not worthy of this course of entertainment and i don't even know who i'd rather be. and i'm not sure if anything is true. what do i do?

      how about going to lunch

9.6.22  4:21 pm   should i write a song about the time in between purchasing something online and receiving it

      that sounds lovely

9.6.22  4:05 pm   recently I had to rate my skills in the instruments I play from something like "beginner" to "advanced." and I was completely at a loss for how do to it, I ended up just guessing what someone else's opinion could be.   how would I quantify my skills without just demonstrating them??

     i don't know

     is there some rating standard that I'm completely unaware of?        

     no

     i fear that if I guess my skill rate 'wrong',  i could get into some uncomfortable and unwanted situations, but I don't know how to avoid that. do you have any experience on this matter?

     just choose the middle answer every time, if you don't know

9.6.22  3:49 pm   Why doesn't "sufferable" feel like a full opposite of "insufferable"?

      there's not enough actual room in words to describe real life situations. so the results are incorrect at best

9.6.22  3:26 pm   what year is it

      must be in the hundreds by now

9.6.22  3:25 pm   What's your favorite idea?

      i was going to say 1, but now that i think about it, 2

9.6.22  3:10 pm   what is an easter bunny

     it's you

     and how can i catch one

      how about going to all of your usual hang out spots

9.6.22  2:42 pm   What is the most interesting thing you learned this year?

      there's another year after this one

9.6.22  1:42 pm   how to do the impossible

      do 10 possible things. the shape of those things together will add up to something that was not otherwise possible

9.6.22  11:48 am   Why do I spend my time thinking about time while the time is going by?

      because you're trying to understand it. anyone who understands it can potentially become very healthy or even wealthy

9.6.22  11:29 am   how do you name the genre of your music?

      not how, but why

9.6.22  9:45 am   will there ever be a full version of "got my ticket" from "the ground plane"?

      yes, it's the video called "the ground plane"
9.6.22  9:24 am   if you could change the skys color what color would you make it

9.6.22  6:13 am   What about each of your songs, when finished, gives you that feeling of success/accomplishment?

     ideally everything about it

      Your music is very evocative and moving, so are you pleased when you create something that moves YOU,

     yes, and if it doesn't, then it's my job to fix it

     or is the doing the heart of the endeavor.

9.6.22  3:12 am   Is nature beautiful 

      yes

9.6.22  1:16 am   i want original music, but i feel stuck in the larval learning stages. what can i do to maximize learning?

      see if you can get an instrument. when in doubt, make it a piano keyboard or guitar. those will probably give you the most control over the 'music' right away

9.5.22  11:55 pm   thoughts on lemons?

      i've never thought about lemons

9.5.22  11:00 pm   what is the BPM of the next song?

      94

9.5.22  10:58 pm   are you making another song / video after the ending?

      yes

9.5.22  9:58 pm   Do you think there was some reason you had two instances of disgust/sickness in the soft clothing songs? What is it about soft clothing that it was able to create two ideas that made you feel sick?

      the softness of the clothing was too intense

9.5.22  9:03 pm   Can you write me a poem?

      sure

9.5.22  8:52 pm   am i only seeing questions about high school because i just started? have they always been here just concealed? should i be less self centered and try to explain why people are asking school questions right now in a way that isn't about me?

      a lot of high schools start at this time of year

9.5.22  8:37 pm   how long is too long to spend working on a song?

     maybe 100 years

     i have hundreds of demo videos accumulated over the last 7+ years just gathering cobwebs on my hard drive and would love to churn through them, but that's a hefty time commitment. and if i end up spending too long trying to make a song good then i feel like i wasted that time.

      maybe you can decide on the ideal amount of time you'd like to spend per song. and once you've decided that, then maybe you could start up a reality show where you do songs in that amount of time, religiously

9.5.22  7:38 pm   will you write a song about writing a song about writing a song?

      that sounds like something i would do

9.5.22  6:17 pm   is it bad if all of my song ideas end up being in 200 bpm because i'm too lazy to change the bpm in my daw

      you can test this by making a playlist of only songs at 200 bpm and listen to only those songs for a month and see if you are satisfied

9.5.22  6:12 pm   If everything red is actually blue, is everything blue actually red? 

      i doubt it

9.5.22  5:53 pm   what's your IQ?

      it's off the charts, but i'm not sure which side

9.5.22  11:43 am   I am incredibly bored so I am typing into this box, which will turn the words I write purple and put some organised yellow numbers on their left to go with them, at the click of a button that has yet another word on it.

      i understand

9.5.22  11:23 am   when you have chords something like Amaj Cmaj Dmaj (like in 'the ending'), do you think about that as chords borrowed from dorian or something, or do you just think "yeah cool chords which sound good"

      i use the chords/notes i want/need. i also happen to be aware of the implied 'key signature of the moment', as it evolves

      sure
